name: snowberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] (also snowberry bush) a small bush that has small pink flowers and round, white berries, often grown in gardens: Native plants including hazelnut, sword fern, and snowberry appear in the park. Even though wildlife enjoys eating the fruit of the snowberry bush, it is poisonous to people.
[ C ] the round, white fruit of the snowberry bush: You can sometimes see the butterflies feeding on snowberries.
More examplesFewer examplesThe snowberry gets overgrown as it ages. In the wild, snowberry bushes can be found along riverbanks and scattered through woodlands.Wildflowers, untamed grasses and snowberries carpet the ground of the cemetery.These creamy little pearls are called snowberries.
